author: andschwa
body: The linked user voice no longer exists. I suggest removing this option unless we know where we should point Windows PowerShell users. Found by @sdwheeler.

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: Where can users to report Windows PowerShell issues?

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body:
Feedback Hub app, see https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell#windows-powershell-vs-powershell-core
GitHub
GitHub - PowerShell/PowerShell: PowerShell for every system!
PowerShell for every system! Contribute to PowerShell/PowerShell development by creating an account on GitHub.

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body:
> Feedback Hub app, see https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell#windows-powershell-vs-powershell-core > Why not replace the old link with this one?
GitHub
GitHub - PowerShell/PowerShell: PowerShell for every system!
PowerShell for every system! Contribute to PowerShell/PowerShell development by creating an account on GitHub.

comments.body: Reopen the PR to restart CIs.

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body: @iSazonov I guess the CIs won't be triggered by changes in `.github` folder. I can merge this forcefully.
